sentences.en: A tourniquet may be left in place for one or two hours without causing damage.
sentences.cn: 在不造成伤害的情况下,使用止血带一到两个小时.

sentences.en: All air is expressed from the sphygmomanometer or pneumatic tourniquet before application.
sentences.cn: 应在止血带或血压计使用前压出所有剩余气体.

sentences.en: Alright. This tourniquet is tight. How does it feel?
sentences.cn: 好了, 止血带紧了, 觉得怎样?

sentences.en: Cell firing rate ( CFR ) of RVM can be used as the monitoring index of tourniquet pain.
sentences.cn: RVM中 的细胞放电速率 ( cellfiringrate,CFR ) 的变化可用作应用止血带时引起的痛觉刺激的监测指标.

sentences.en: I need a tourniquet and some ice.

sentences.cn: 上帝啊! 我的止血带.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the best charged pressure of pneumatic tourniquet in individualized using.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨充气止血带个体化使用时的适宜充气压力.

sentences.en: Operations on the extremities are made easier by the use of a tourniquet.
sentences.cn: 应用止血带使四肢的手术更加简单清晰,止血带是一种具有潜在危险性的设备.

sentences.en: She gently placed a tourniquet 22 around my foreleg as a tear ran down her cheek.
sentences.cn: 她温柔地给我的前腿绑上了止血带,一滴泪珠从她的脸颊滑落.

sentences.en: She prepared to undo the band of cloth around his arm which had served as tourniquet.
sentences.cn: 她准备解开缠在他胳臂上止血的布带.

sentences.en: Solutions should not be allowed to flow a tourniquet.
sentences.cn: 消毒液不应流入止血带下.

sentences.en: Still, it remains to be seen whether the tourniquet will hold. Even after the new plan, Greece will have a staggering load of debt.
sentences.cn: 然而止血带能否承受压力尚待分晓。即使新计划得以实施，希腊仍将面临巨额债务负担。

sentences.en: That will work as a tourniquet.
sentences.cn: 就和止血带的功用一样了.

sentences.en: The tourniquet is a potentially dangerous instrument that must be used with proper knowledge and care.
sentences.cn: 因此,使用时必须具备相关的知识并且非常小心.

sentences.en: The tourniquet should occlude venous and lymphatic return.
sentences.cn: 止血带应阻断静脉及淋巴回流.

sentences.en: This tourniquet is tight. How does it feel?
sentences.cn: 好了，止血带紧了，觉得怎样？

trans.tran_en: a band of cloth that is twisted tightly around an injured arm or leg to stop it bleeding
